Instruction: Incorporate garlic and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in the cooked rice, mix well, and cook for an additional 2 to 3 minutes.

Break the ground beef into the rice mixture; cook and stir until the beef is fully browned, approximately 8 to 10 minutes. Incorporate the tomato sauce and diced tomatoes into the ground beef mixture. Cover, lower the heat, and simmer until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes.
